Notes.Text:
This update for slurm fixes the following issues:

Security issues fixed:

- CVE-2019-6438: Fixed SchedMD Slurm that mishandles 32-bit systems (bnc#1123304).
- Fix permissions of slurmdbd.conf (bsc#1155784).
 
Bug fixes:

- Fix ownership of /var/spool/slurm on new installations and upgrade (bsc#1158696).
- Fix %posttrans macro _res_update to cope with added newline (bsc#1153259).
Notes.Title: Details
